conclusion: Preliminary objection joined to merits and dismissed (Article 34 - Victim);Violation of Article 13+8 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy) (Article 8-2 - Interference;Prescribed by law;Article 8-1 - Respect for family life;Respect for private life;Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life;Expulsion) (Brazil);Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF DE SOUZA RIBEIRO v. FRANCE - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
issue: Article L. 511-4 (2) of the Code regulating the entry and residence of aliens and asylum-seekers
